statements.select:
select t2.material_name,t3.equip_name,T4.SHIFT_NAME,t1.* from HPT_SEMIS_TECH_BJP t1 left join sbm_material t2 on t1.material_id=t2.objid left join sbe_equip t3 on t1.equip_id=t3.objid LEFT JOIN ssb_shift T4 ON T1.SHIFT_ID=T4.OBJID
T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
T1.RECORD_TIME >= #where.BeginTime#
T1.RECORD_TIME <= #where.EndTime#
t3.EQUIP_NAME like '%' || #EquipName# || '%'
T1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG#
ORDER BY $OrderString$

select t2.material_name,t3.equip_name,T4.SHIFT_NAME,t1.* from HPT_SEMIS_TECH_BJP t1 left join sbm_material t2 on t1.material_id=t2.objid left join sbe_equip t3 on t1.equip_id=t3.objid LEFT JOIN ssb_shift T4 ON T1.SHIFT_ID=T4.OBJID
(T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#)
